title: Alaska for Peace
description: We must wait to see if this will be enough for Trump’s Peace Nobel Prize.

title: Nobody calls me a chicken
description: Trump welcomed Putin at a military base with a B2 bomber and fighter jets flight overhead.

title: AI Balloon
description: Reaction to Sam Altman's statement about the emergence and eventual bursting of the AI bubble.

title: It is Ukraine's turn ...
description: Zelensky, with full support from the EU, accepted the possibility of ceding territory in favor of securing peace.

title: Woke is not dead!
description: I ripped it to feel awake.

title: So let it be peace
description: ... and be peace ...

title: The biggest sensation of the transfer window
description: Maria Arreghini and Luka Modrić swap jerseys, and possibly careers. Ballon d'Or for microphone, legacy vs likes.

title: Paradise Lost
description: When presidential duties take paradise from him.

title: Bon Appétit
description: Civilization of the 21st century. How far have we really come from the cave?

title: US Open Wealth Parade
description: When multimillionaires compete for millions more, even their luggage needs certification.

title: Repatriation? We Prefer Replication.
description: Exclusively by BM Director: Egyptian mummies no more Egyptian exclusive!

title: Antarctica’s Hottest Threat: Bikini Babes & Sunscreen
description: Forget fossil fuels, this Sun’s got bigger problems. Bikini babes, sunscreen, and a melting Antarctic spa day. A climate tragicomedy at its hottest, with penguins trapped in a rapidly changing landscape nightmare.

title: The Magneto Gambit
description: You cannot tax what you cannot touch. But you can chase it, threaten it, and build empires trying to control it.

title: Cosmic Clout: Selfie from the Stratosphere!!!
description: A selfie-obsessed Earth culture, so entranced by its own reflection it fails to notice the alien lifeform — perhaps too peaceful to be seen by a world at war.

title: Through Windows, Beyond Linux
description: Linus codes history as Tux’s prophetic words come true.

title: Pride Parade on Victory Day
description: Rolling under a rainbow in a parade they never meant to lead - military might dressed in glitter and pride. See you guys on the 3rd of September.

title: One man's loss is another man's gain.
description: Mercedes Papaya Split: Built to last - unless it’s parked on Lando’s pit side.

title: GPS Drama - Gremlins or Kremlins!
description: No ground control, Signal lost in the sky. Directionless in cockpit, While Gremlin watches nearby.

title: Royal Budget Meets Royal Wishlist
description: When the wishlist outweighs the budget, even the crown feels like a burden.

title: Headaches of New World Order
description: Perhaps the better solution is for Vladimir to nuke DC ... or just go buy from Ursula.

title: Dragon of Liberty
description: Another one trying to deliver liberty through brute force.

title: Orbital Duel of Stock Titans
description: How will they return to Earth if stock values freefall... perhaps by gravity, in gravity freefall.

title: Disbelief of the 80s Sci-Fi Tech Dream Droid
description: The Church’s dogmatic algorithm accepts no exceptions - unless you’re a female humanoid with divine firmware.

title: Victory Day Afterparty
description: When diplomacy starts to dance — the victory ball in Beijing begins.

title: White House Supper: Where Big Tech Leaves the Algorithms Off the Plate
description: This will surely not end like the Last Supper.

title: Forehand to Fairway: So the Golf Club President Be Pleased
description: Wining in wrong sport with wrong haircut.

title: Happy 40th Birthday, Captain
description: When the scoreboard tells more than just the score.

title: Leashed Ambitions
description: When loyalty is measured in snarls and leash length.

title: Drone Olympics - Poland 2025.
description: Citius, Altius, Fortius... Violatius.

title: When Prince Charming Needs a Charge
description: Happily ever after ... after 300 volts.

title: Hollywood GP: The Final Reckoning
description: F1 finally proved to be fastest ... not Mission Impossible.

title: Cloud God of Wall Street
description: The stars belong to dreamers, the cloud to gods.

title: Red Carpet, Red Eye - Sofia’s Emmys Sudden Exit
description: Emmy for Sofia’s Eye: Best Supporting Swell

title: One Small Disk for Linus, One Giant Leap for Free Software
description: Commemorating the release of Linux 0.01, September 17, 1991. In a world of proprietary giants, one floppy dared to be free.

title: Wild West Cowboy Steers a Royal Deal
description: When tradition meets horsepower and diplomacy wears spurs, the royal drive takes an unexpected turn.

title: When Royal Dinner Meets Drive-Thru
description: Plenty to eat at the palace, just nothing in paper wrappers, but Gaza kids would have nothing against paper wrapped food.

title: Entry not permited for Limited Powering Advanced AI
description: Access denied: insufficient FPS!

title: Exodus 20:3 - Thou shalt have no other gods before me.
description: They made a molten idol and worshipped it. But the Lord is God, and Bitcoin is not, and neither Golden Trump.

title: The Ascension According to Duplantis 6:30
description: Cessna requested clearance to overfly - approved, Duplantis already overflew.

title: UN Harmony 2025: Diplomatic Dissonance
description: Conducted by sweat, accompanied by ego, performed without rehearsal - all under a banner of consensus we’re not sure will ever materialize.

title: Clash of Titans: Dembélé vs. Yamal in the Ballon d’Or Ring 2025
description: VAR can’t save you here lads, nor the ring bell!

title: Severance World Champion 2025.
description: Exit strategy: executed to perfection. Earning more on the sofa than others do in a lifetimes.

title: Chainsaw of Recovered Sovereignty!
description: Milei’s diplomacy emits more CO₂ than a G7 summit.

title: STELLANTIS TIMELESS MACHINE™
description: Featuring Adaptive Shovel Interface™, Walkie-Talkie Networking™ with SteamOS v.18th century™

title: Rimac's Recipe for Success: AAA for Top Speed
description: Don't overcomplicate energy storage! - Rimac's new hypercar battery tech, proudly powered by Aliexpress.

title: Fiscal Drama of Capitol Pluckers
description: Two daisies, one budget, zero consensus. If all petals fall ... the government wilts.

title: Meta AI Glasses Revolutionized 21st Century Animal Farm
description: From whip to Wi-Fi, the barn went full prompt - Animal Farm rebooted by Meta AI Glasses and unapologetic bandwidth demands.

title: Golden Eye Winner Russell Crowe Calls for Loud Will to Peace!
description: He fought for Righteous Rome. Now he stands for the world’s peace.

title: Sensation from the White House: We Have a Deal About Ryugu’s Rare Minerals!
description: Trump seals trade talks about rare Ryugu minerals. JD Vance furious as Ryugu aliens didn’t even say: Thank you, Mr. President! And they didn’t even wear suits!
